name: Qualihires- Recruiting Experts Worldwide
description: Qualihires has developed a recruitment model, which focuses on what we consider to be the 3 most important ingredients for a successful recruitment placement, our Candidates, Clients and Consultants. Quite simply, our vision, working culture and ethos is geared up to serve these three important stakeholders equally. As it is an alliance between these 3 parties which make placements possible. Our aim is to cultivate a 'community environment'
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Headline: We believe in nurturing relationships
ShortDescription: Qualihires has developed a recruitment model, which focuses on what we consider to be the 3 most important ingredients for a successful recruitment placement, our Candidates, Clients and Consultants.
enhanced_description: Qualihires is a global recruiting firm founded in 2015, specializing in full lifecycle recruitment to provide superior quality hires. Their unique recruitment model focuses on fostering an alliance and community environment between candidates, clients, and their own consultants, aiming to nurture relationships. They operate as staffing services and HR consulting providers, with an objective to boost hiring manager confidence and productivity, and enable clients to hire top talent faster and more efficiently. Qualihires leverages diverse domain experience to support a wide range of recruitment needs.
key_use_cases: Sourcing and placement of high-quality talent
Improving hiring manager productivity and satisfaction
competitive_advantages: Proprietary recruitment model focusing on Candidates, Clients, and Consultants
Commitment to cultivating a 'community environment' and nurturing relationships
Demonstrated ability to deliver superior quality hires
roi_benefits: Increased hiring manager confidence and productivity
Higher quality hires leading to better performance and retention
